name: 登塔者们 Babel Climbers
description:
Deep Jedi, ignorance and fearlessness

You wake up, tower climber? The immense tower in front of us is our real world!
You will carry the mission of the lower classes of humanity - to climb up and up. One generation of us will eventually find the legendary heaven!



The strange world you have never seen

Unlike the Earth in your dreams, each layer is a region, and hard-working people and complex organizations live in different layers.
You will experience rivers and deserts built by people, touch trees, and nothing will stop you.
And what is the last heaven like?



Simple and interesting adventures

Good morning. Throw up the dice in your hand. It's not necessary to take a few steps and encounter anything.
The people in Tari are very interesting. How you get along depends on your choice.
Go up in a limited number of days and remember that tower keepers don't eat soft food!
Watch your feet! Runes on bricks have magical effects!



Clear and Rich Time Point Fighting

Time is relatively passing. I guess every punch takes three seconds!
Learn swordsmanship, magic, saints and witches from masters, and match yourself!
Collect equipment and props to enhance your routine, you will go on!



New reincarnation

A generation of tower climbers fell down, and the next generation had already packed their bags.
Life is full of states, but never give up.
Until the opening of the gates of heaven, the advent of a new era?



Well, wake up, the key to the world is in your wallet.



By Nianless

Thank you very much for supporting me to develop it. (grey)
QQ group: 332836917
